bill.title: Relating To Income Withholding For Child Support.
bill.description: Imposes a fine against any employer who fails to comply with income withholding requirements applicable to child and spousal support, or discharges, refuses to employ, or takes disciplinary action against a person because the person is subject to income withholding requirements. (HB1025 HD2)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Pass First Reading
Referred to HUS, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 5
Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS on Friday, 02-03-17 9:00AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Morikawa, Todd, Kobayashi, Oshiro, Tupola; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Har.
Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 55) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Oshiro excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Wednesday, 02-15-17 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Nishimoto, Belatti, Brower, Johanson, C. Lee, Morikawa, Nakashima, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) San Buenaventura, Oshiro, McDermott.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 681) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite, Tokioka excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-23-17 11:00AM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Cachola, DeCoite, Gates, Holt, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, LoPresti, Lowen, Nakamura, Tokioka, Quinlan, Yamashita, Tupola, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Choy.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 779), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ichiyama excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 53).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to JDL, WAM.
Carried over to 2018 Regular Session.
Re-referred to HHS, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 2
Re-Referred to LBR, WAM.
